attributes.contentHtml: NaysKutzu i know dennis doesnt ddos, but he gets people to ddos for him which he has blatantly admitted to. somebody who doesnt want me to share their name said to me, "if you hire a hitman to kill somebody and you get caught, your the one getting the charges for hiring the hitman"

ItzScriptsIsBack How dumb are you. You have no proof whatsoever that dennis has some 1 that is doing that and btw why TF shall he even ddos a host how does that help everyone from here that is mentally stable knows that ddos-ing someone/host because it's just going down for like 2 minutes or how long the ddos attack it's going to last I mean be real after a start of a ddos attack the servers are gonna work if some 1 just turns on some firewall stuff etc. I mean get real ddosing does not damage a server or breaks anything so yeah
